title: Ccbd or cie internship
content:
I got selected for both cie and ccbd 
Idk which to select any suggestions

comments.body: Center for Cloud Computing and Big Data
CIE, when did they announce internship?
Unpaid one, but ig 3-4 weeks back

So what do you say is better ccbd is 6 weeks 
And cie is 8 weeks (I kinda want to enjoy holidays a bit too) but the catch is ccbd is research ig and cie is project oriented
U can pick depending on ur interest. if u are someone into research, pick CCBD

I worked at CCBD and had a great experience. You can check my old comments for more info, but to summarise, since it's a research internship your experience will depend on the prof and the project. If you are interested in research or want to try out research, CCBD would be a good pick. Ofc as I said, it's not guaranteed to give you a good experience. If you want to stay away from research at all costs, then maybe CIE would be a better fit for you.
I'm in the same dilemma rn. Would be great if ex-interns of CIE or CCBD could share their experience, would help a lot.
